name: The Secret of Mossbrook
description:
The Secret of Mossbrook is a puzzle/adventure game about a young child and their desire to become a powerful wizard.

Featuring three different endings, over 25 unique puzzles,  and a cute story line centred around a small village.

This game was created for an RTP-only month long game jam. Custom graphics are used very sparingly, and I decided to restrict myself to RPG Maker's eventing systems only. I had a great time making it, and I hope you have fun playing it too.

Please let me know if you find any bugs or mistakes so that I can try to fix them.

Thanks!
